task.title: How to Become an Admin on a Company LinkedIn Page
task.shortdesc: As an admin, you will have full permissions to manage the page.

taskbody.prereq: A current page Admin will also have instructions to complete in order for you to be added as an admin.

step.cmd: Log into your personal LinkedIn account.
Search for and connect with the individual that is already a "administrator" for the company page.
Consult the instructions for the current page administrator and then return once completed.
Navigate to the LinkedIn homepage. Access to the company LinkedIn page should now be visible on the homepage.
Finally, consult with an employee that is a current Super Admin in order to successfully update the permissions.
